thread.title: Russia accused of hacking MH17 inquiry
thread.title_full: Russia accused of hacking MH17 inquiry | News24

author: news24.com
title: Russia accused of hacking MH17 inquiry
text:
The Hague - Russian spies likely tried to hack into the Dutch Safety Board's computer systems to access a sensitive final report into the shooting down of flight MH17 over Ukraine, experts said on Friday.
The cyberattacks were revealed by security experts Trend Micro which blamed a shadowy group dubbed Operation Pawn Storm, "an active economic and political cyber-espionage operation" that has targeted the White House and Nato in the past.
A spokesperson for the Dutch board, which led the investigation into how Malaysia Airlines flight came down in July 2014 over war-torn Ukraine, confirmed the board had detected the attacks.
But there was "no evidence" that anyone "was successful in the attempt," spokesperson Sara Vernooij told AFP.
